conversation_metadata.key_workflow: PRIME initialization → Smart Chain execution → Quality validation → Content delivery

project_context.project_name: Nick Pilot Project - ILPA Templates Article
project_context.deliverable: 2-3 page thought leadership article on ILPA Reporting & Performance Templates
project_context.audience: CFOs and finance executives of private equity funds
project_context.strategic_context: Pilot project to demonstrate AI consulting capabilities and build future BDO opportunities

user_preferences.technical_depth: Balance high-level benefits with specific implementation details that encourage follow-up BDO discussions
user_preferences.article_structure: Executive Summary → Background → Key Changes → Implementation Implications
user_preferences.comparison_approach: Concise 2016 vs 2025 comparison, emphasize Performance Template as new standardization step
user_preferences.cfo_focus: Adoption timing, system/process adjustments, resource planning with cost/benefit analysis
user_preferences.industry_context: Reference SEC PFA Rules as driver, broad industry endorsement without naming competitors
user_preferences.visual_approach: Professional but clear, simple tables, 1-2 anonymized screenshots/samples
user_preferences.deliverable_format: Word document with detailed bullet point outline
user_preferences.positioning: Firm BDO thought leadership, positive proactive tone
user_preferences.review_process: User reviews outline before full draft development
